channel.title: CVE Feed for miniOrange -- WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for miniOrange -- WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn)

item.title: CVE-2023-47683|2024-06-04T17:26:43.129Z -- miniorange -- wordpress%20social%20login%20and%20register%20%28discord%2C%20google%2C%20twitter%2C%20linkedin%29
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in miniOrange WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn) allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn): from n/a through 7.6.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-23710|2023-04-25T19:41:40.424Z -- miniorange -- wordpress%20social%20login%20and%20register%20%28discord%2C%20google%2C%20twitter%2C%20linkedin%29
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in miniOrange WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn) plugin <= 7.5.14 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-23706|2023-05-23T12:41:37.545Z -- miniorange -- wordpress%20social%20login%20and%20register%20%28discord%2C%20google%2C%20twitter%2C%20linkedin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in miniOrange WordPress Social Login and Register (Discord, Google, Twitter, LinkedIn) plugin <= 7.5.14 versions.
